verse: I'm gonna sing, sing, sing

are open wide I'm gonna sit by

Swing low, sweet chariot

Coming for to carry me home
Oh, when the saints go
marching in, When the saints go

in that number When the saints go

This train is bound for glory
This train. This train is bound for
glory, This train. This train is bound
